content: get ready for spooky season and craft an adorable crochet cat silhouette panel finished panel measures approximately 8 x 8 5 inches using the suggested materials size may vary based on yarn and hook size used and would be perfect for a mini wall hanging or small candy tote bag skill level suitable for intermediate crocheters with basic knowledge of stitches and tapestry techniques pattern includes * pattern in standard us crochet terms * complete pattern graphs and color block instructions * reference photos and video tutorials suggested materials * worsted weight yarn in 2 colors * 5 mm crochet hook basic knowledge of tapestry crochet concepts are highly recommended
